Purdue University
STATION W B A A
LAFAYETTE, INDIANA
December 27, 1956
Mr. Harry J. Skornia, Executive Director
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
119 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
Attached please find a letter from Bill Bender
regarding the brochure on "Politics in the 20th
Century", all of which leads me to believe that some¬
where, sometime we should perhaps hold a meeting on
such publicity pieces with good, competent people,
AND DISCUSS, AND PERHAPS ORAW UP, A TOTAL PLAN OF
OPERATION FOR PROMOTION AT THE LOCAL STATION LEVEL.
It might be A VERY REAL WORKSHOP project for the
Summer of 1957.
-cfAMES S. Miles
Director, Radio Station WBAA
